name: get_video_list
description: Retrieve a list of all videos available in the library to find video IDs, paths, and metadata.

name: upload_videos
description: Upload multiple local video files by providing their absolute file paths.

video_paths.description: An array of absolute local file paths for the video files.

category_ids.description: Optional list of category/group IDs to assign to these videos.

name: upload_folder
description: Import all supported video files from a specified local directory.

folder_path.description: The absolute local path of the directory containing videos to import.

category_ids.description: Optional list of category/group IDs to assign to the imported videos.

name: get_categories
description: List existing categories or groups by their type.

type.description: The type of categories to retrieve.

name: create_category
description: Create a new category, anchor, or product group.

name.description: The name of the new category.

type.description: The type of category to create.

name: start_smart_cut
description: Initiate an AI smart editing task for selected videos based on instructions.

video_ids.description: List of video IDs to process.

prompt_id.description: Prompt ID to use for editing.

prompt_text.description: Editing instructions or creative ideas for the AI.

min_duration.description: Desired minimum output duration in seconds.

max_duration.description: Desired maximum output duration in seconds.
